message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"to lack; not enough","sentence":"这里的水差。","image_prompt":"A glass of water on a table, filled only halfway, with a visible dry and cracked setting around it, evoking a sense of shortage. The scene should have muted colors and a gentle, soft apocalypse animation style, with subtle hints of emptiness but no chaos.","sentence_translation":"There is not enough water here."}
